Articles.Content: Here is a screenshot of my UI scaled R&D chart in career mode. Some very important numbers are missing. What am I supposed to do? The game is not playable with an unscaled UI.
Don't scale it quite all the way up. If you back it off just a little bit from max scaling, then all the displays come back.
160% UI scale is the number where the UI is still all there for me. Anything higher and stuff starts to disappear/fall apart.
